caption.p: Plant diet richness across an elevation gradient in pre‐monsoon (Premon) and post‐ monsoon season (Postmon) (HAK: Har ki doon; MAD: Madmaheshwar; NAN: Bedni‐roopkund; RUD: Rudranath; TUN: Tungnath; full details of the study sites are provided in Figure 1) [Colour figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
